title: 2 bed/2.5 BATH = 2 MASTER BEDS, FIVE POINTS!!!
posting_body: Charming 2 bed/2.5 bath townhouse in the heart of Five Points Denver.
Spacious Kitchen, Dining room and living room on the main level including kitchen island and lots of cabinet space.
Half bath and balcony on second story as well.
Washer/Dryer on upper level and two master bedrooms each with their own private bath.
Downstairs includes bonus office space/mud room off entryway and a spacious one car garage with room for storage.
Residents pay gas/electric to Xcel energy.
Water, Sewer, Snow Removal and Landscaping included with rent.
Walkable to music venues and bars/restaurants in Rino and the rest of Downtown.
Denver Central Market just blocks away.
Lots of street parking available in neighborhood.
Convenient location to drive towards City Park/Stapleton area.
Cats and Dogs considered with a $300 refundable pet deposit per pet.
Central A/C. Residents must set up their own cable tv/internet.
